Installation complies with current drawings & specifications
Installation materials were used in accordance with manufacturer requirements
Check valves isolating the test zone are securely shut off & tagged
Nominate an air purging valve point
Nominate a pressure testing valve point (if none at meter manifold)
Check valves within the test zone are open as required
Check lugged elbows & open ends are capped
Check pressure sensitive mixing valves & meters are isolated from the test zone
Slowly open a feeder valve & fill the test zone with water until completely purged of any air
Connect pressure testing device to the nominated test point
Shut off the water feeder valve
Commence testing by slowly increasing pressure up to 1500 kPa and hold
Testing is deemed successful if the water pressure remains unchanged after at least 30 minutes
Take a photo at the start & end of static pressure test
Following a succussful test, slowly release the pressure and return the system back to operational condition
Installation complies with current drawings & specifications
Installation materials were used in accordance with manufacturer requirements
Check valves isolating the test zone are securely shut off & tagged
Nominate an air purging valve point
Nominate a pressure testing valve point (if none at meter manifold)
Check valves within the test zone are open as required
Check lugged elbows & open ends are capped
Check pressure sensitive mixing valves & meters are isolated from the test zone
Slowly open a feeder valve & fill the test zone with water until completely purged of any air
Connect pressure testing device to the nominated test point
Shut off the water feeder valve
Commence testing by slowly increasing pressure up to one & half (1.5) x working pressure and hold
Testing is deemed successful if the water pressure remains unchanged after at least 30 minutes
Take a photo at the start & end of static pressure test
Following a succussful test, slowly release the pressure and return the system back to operational condition
Testing Potable Water Including Pressure Sensitive Valves (900 kPa)
Installation complies with current drawings & specifications
Installation materials were used in accordance with manufacturer requirements
Check valves isolating the test zone are securely shut off & tagged
Nominate an air purging valve point
Nominate a pressure testing valve point (if none at meter manifold)
Check valves within the test zone are open as required
Check lugged elbows & open ends are capped
Slowly open a feeder valve & fill the test zone with water until completely purged of any air
Connect pressure testing device to the nominated test point
Shut off the water feeder valve
Commence testing by slowly increasing pressure up to 900 kPa and hold
Testing is deemed successful if the water pressure remains unchanged after at least 30 minutes
Take a photo at the start & end of static pressure test
Following a succussful test, slowly release the pressure and return the system back to operational condition
Installation complies with current drawings & specifications
Installation materials were used in accordance with manufacturer requirements
Check valves isolating the test zone are securely shut off & tagged
Nominate an air purging valve point
Nominate a pressure testing valve point
Check valves isolating the test zone are securely shut off & tagged
Check lugged elbows & open ends are capped
Connect pressure testing device to the nominated test point
Slowly open test feeder valve & fill the test zone with inert gas until completely purged
Shut off the gas feeder valve
For high pressure test: Commence testing by slowly increasing pressure to 1.5 kPa above working pressure
For low pressure test: Commence testing by slowly increasing pressure up to no greater than 7kPa
Testing is deemed successful if the pressure remains unchanged for 5 mins of every 30 litres volume of pipe
Take a photo at the start & end of static pressure test
Following a succussful test, slowly release the pressure and return the system back to operational condition
